rows.label: campfev11_300_100_msg0002
rows.name:
That bastard...
He knows about your abilities!

rows.label: campfev11_300_100_msg0005
rows.name:
They know about our trump card, and
we don't have Shin.. It's a tough fight
from here...but we can't give up.

rows.label: campfev11_300_100_msg0006
rows.name:
Kasumi. Let's head out to Torigo
Village as soon as preparations
are complete.
